name: MonsterVRumble
description:
First early access release of MonsterVRumble, a multiplayer asymetric experience where the VR-Player controls a huge monster that has to be stopped by the PC-Player at the wheels of different military vehicles.

Local multiplayer for now (PC vs VR), online capabilities and further compatibility with other devices in progress. Oculus Rift & Quest2(with Link) tested.

This game has been developed as final project for Computer Graphics Virtual Reality - Games Master at URJC
